description: This Dart source file defines the UI screen for processing menu image recognition, parsing, and generation tasks in a Flutter app. It includes the ProcessingScreen widget, its state management, progress display, navigation, and interaction with the orchestrator service.

classes.name: ProcessingArgs
classes.description: A class holding arguments (image data URL) passed when navigating to the ProcessingScreen.

classes.name: ProcessingScreen
classes.description: A Flutter StatefulWidget representing the main processing status screen, responsible for initiating and displaying progress during image OCR, parsing, and menu generation.

classes.name: _ProcessingScreenState
classes.description: State class for ProcessingScreen handling state management, UI updates, navigation, and interaction with the orchestrator.

classes.name: _ItemProgressList
classes.description: A StatelessWidget that displays the list of menu items with their individual progress and status indicators.

methods.name: didChangeDependencies
methods.description: Overrides to initiate the processing run when dependency changes, particularly at first build.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Constructs the UI, including progress indicators and navigation logic, based on orchestrator state.

methods.name: build
methods.description: _ItemProgressList's build method constructs the list of items with status icons and retry options.
